CustomField.description: This is the ability to classify the types of organizations. It identifies if this account is a true client or if the account is a possible prospect that we have contacted but not established a firm relationship with. Options are: Business Client - a business we are working with. Business Prospect - a business or investment we are trying to work with. Service Provider - a business that we purchase goods or services from. Partner - an organization that we work with.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: It identifies if this account is a true client or if the account is a possible prospect that we have contacted but not established a firm relationship with.
CustomField.label: Account Type
